content: It's the Pumpkin Lantern Festival~! The stars of the show today are pumpkins, costume magic, and long, leisurely strolls.

content: I'm not very good with bustling crowds, but just for today, I'm enjoying sitting among the beautiful pumpkin lanterns.
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-节日-南灯日-1005幻雪_特殊反馈

content: {A笑眯眯}Watching everyone in their extravagant costumes, enjoying themselves and rejoicing... There's an air of... peculiar mystery. Perhaps even the stars will let their hair down tonight?
